instructions: Please take a few minutes to go through the advertisements in this book. Take as much time with each ad as you care to. If you ordinarily wear reading glasses, you'll need them.

questions.prompt: Now, I'd like to ask you a few questions about the ads in the book.
questions.question: What brands or products do you remember seeing ads for in the book? Please specify.
questions.note: DO NOT READ EITHER BRAND NAMES OR PRODUCT CATEGORIES.

additional_questions.condition: IF NO CIGARETTE BRANDS MENTIONED ABOVE ASK Q.3.
additional_questions.question: Do you remember any ads for cigarettes?

additional_questions.condition: IF ONLY ONE OR TWO CIGARETTE BRANDS MENTIONED, SKIP TO Q.3.
additional_questions.question: Any others?

additional_questions.condition: IF ALL THREE CIGARETTE BRANDS MENTIONED, SKIP TO Q.4.
additional_questions.question: Do you remember any ads for any other brands of cigarettes?
